title: The repository definition
description: The list containing all add-ons included in the repository.

id.title: Add-on ID
id.description: The add-on identifier as in addon.xml

branch.title: Repository branch
branch.description: The github repository branch. If not defined, it will be the commit of the latest release or, in case there are no releases, master branch.

assets.title: Repository assets
assets.description:
Dictionary containing string/string key-value pairs, where the key corresponds to the relative asset location and the value corresponds to the real asset location. One can also set "zip" asset, which is a special case for the add-on zip. If an asset is not defined, its location will be automatically evaluated.
Note: assets are treated as "new style" format strings with the following keywords - id, username, repository, branch, system and arch.

asset_prefix.title: Asset prefix
asset_prefix.description: Prefix to use on the real asset location when it is automatically evaluated.

repository.title: Github repository
repository.description: GitHub repository name. If not set, it is assumed to be the same as the add-on id.
